xxl.core.io.converters.meta

Interface ExtendedResultSetMetaData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResultSetMetaData, Wrapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TupleMetaData

    public interface ExtendedResultSetMetaData
extends ResultSetMetaData
    An object that provides information about the columns of a given table. Each column stores specific information about the value of a tuple inside the table. This extension to standard ResultSetMetaData also provides the method getMaxColumnStringLength(int) to handle the maximum length if the column is declared as a string type. Please mark, that ExtendedResultSetMetaData stores all columns for a given table whereas ExtendedColumnMetaData is for a single column.
    See Also:
    ResultSetMetaData, ExtendedColumnMetaData

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getColumnMetaData

        ExtendedColumnMetaData getColumnMetaData(int columnIndex)
        Returns the ExtendedColumnMetaData for the specific column with index columnIndex. Each column has it's own ExtendedColumnMetaData descriptor which the contains column meta data.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The column index
        Returns:
        The meta data descriptor for the column with index columnIndex

      • getContentLength

        int getContentLength(int columnIndex)
        Returns the maximum length of a string object that can be imported into this column
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The column index
        Returns:
        The maximum length of a string
